description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Snake 2 is the sequal to the classic game Snake. The player controls a snake and tries to eat its food. Each time you eat, your snake gets longer. Avoid running into yourself and/or walls while trying to obtain food. HighScores for each difficulty level included.
description.short: Snake 2 is the sequal to the classic game Snake. The player controls a snake and tries to eat its food. Each time you eat, your snake gets longer. Avoid running into yourself and/or walls while trying to obtain food. HighScores for each difficulty level included.
